Name: Dominique Wilkins
Note: Currently team vice president and television color analyst.

Name: Ted Turner
Note: As team owner. While the team presented Turner a framed Hawks jersey with No. 17, the banner raised to the rafters carried an old Hawks logo with Turner's name instead of a number.

Name: Tom Heinsohn
Note: Also served as head coach (1969–1978); as broadcaster (1980–present).
